languages.text: {n}Паскаль говорит тихо, словно стремясь попасть в интонацию Авеля:{/n} "Технобрат Авель прошел диагностику. Тлетворное влияние кощунственных процедур полностью ликвидировано. Статистическое большинство выживших жертв схизматикалей остаются когнитивными калеками, но разум технобрата Авеля более нестандартен, а потому не понес столь серьезных повреждений".

{n}Pasqal speaks softly, as though trying to match the inflections of Abel's voice:{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has passed the diagnostics. The pernicious influence of sacrilegious procedures has been completely eliminated. Statistically, most survivors of a schismaticals' infestation are left with severe cognitive impairments. However, Tech-Brother Abel's mind, being of a less typical nature, has not been damaged to so great a degree."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль говорит тихо, словно стремясь попасть в интонацию Авеля:{/n} "Технобрат Авель прошел диагностику. languages.text: {n}パスカルは、あたかもアベルの声の抑揚に合わせるかのように、静かに話した。{/n}「技術兄弟アベルは診断に成功した。神聖を汚す手順の有害な影響は完全に消去された。統計的に、横行する分理派の生存者のほとんどは認知機能不全となった。しかし、技術兄弟アベルの精神は、少し一般的ではないが、そこまでの大きなダメージを負っていない。
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal speaks softly, as though trying to match the inflections of Abel's voice:{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has passed the diagnostics. The pernicious influence of sacrilegious procedures has been completely eliminated. Statistically, most survivors of a schismaticals' infestation are left with severe cognitive impairments. However, Tech-Brother Abel's mind, being of a less typical nature, has not been damaged to so great a degree."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは、あたかもアベルの声の抑揚に合わせるかのように、静かに話した。{/n}「技術兄弟アベルは診断に成功した。神聖を汚す手順の有害な影響は完全に消去された。統計的に、横行する分理派の生存者のほとんどは認知機能不全となった。しかし、技術兄弟アベルの精神は、少し一般的ではないが、そこまでの大きなダメージを負っていない。

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡轻声细语地开了口，听起来像是在模仿亚伯的声音。{/n}“技术兄弟已经完成了诊断，所有亵渎程序造成的有害影响都已完全消除。统计结果显示，绝大多数遭到分离者入侵的幸存者，都遭受了严重的认知障碍。不过，技术兄弟亚伯的意识较为独特，因此并没有遭受严重破坏。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal speaks softly, as though trying to match the inflections of Abel's voice:{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has passed the diagnostics. The pernicious influence of sacrilegious procedures has been completely eliminated. Statistically, most survivors of a schismaticals' infestation are left with severe cognitive impairments. However, Tech-Brother Abel's mind, being of a less typical nature, has not been damaged to so great a degree."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡轻声细语地开了口，听起来像是在模仿亚伯的声音。{/n}“技术兄弟已经完成了诊断，所有亵渎程序造成的有害影响都已完全消除。统计结果显示，绝大多数遭到分离者入侵的幸存者，都遭受了严重的认知障碍。不过，技术兄弟亚伯的意识较为独特，因此并没有遭受严重破坏。”

languages.text: {n}Pasqal spricht ruhig, als versuche er, sich Abels Tonfall anzugleichen.{/n} "Tech-Bruder Abel hat die Diagnose abgeschlossen. Der schädliche Einfluss gotteslästerlicher Prozeduren wurde vollständig eliminiert. Statistisch gesehen tragen die meisten Überlebenden einer Infizierung durch Abtrünnige schwere kognitive Schäden davon. Tech-Bruder Abels Geist jedoch ist untypisch und wurde nicht in so hohem Maße geschädigt."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal speaks softly, as though trying to match the inflections of Abel's voice:{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has passed the diagnostics. The pernicious influence of sacrilegious procedures has been completely eliminated. Statistically, most survivors of a schismaticals' infestation are left with severe cognitive impairments. However, Tech-Brother Abel's mind, being of a less typical nature, has not been damaged to so great a degree."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal spricht ruhig, als versuche er, sich Abels Tonfall anzugleichen.{/n} "Tech-Bruder Abel hat die Diagnose abgeschlossen. Der schädliche Einfluss gotteslästerlicher Prozeduren wurde vollständig eliminiert. Statistisch gesehen tragen die meisten Überlebenden einer Infizierung durch Abtrünnige schwere kognitive Schäden davon. Tech-Bruder Abels Geist jedoch ist untypisch und wurde nicht in so hohem Maße geschädigt."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal parle doucement, comme pour se caler sur les inflexions vocales d'Abel :{/n} « Le technofrère Abel s'est soumis aux diagnostics. L'influence pernicieuse des procédures sacrilèges a été éradiquée. Statistiquement, la plupart des survivants à une infestation schismatique souffrent de graves séquelles cognitives. Cependant, l'esprit d'Abel étant d'une nature plus atypique, les dégâts qui lui ont été infligés sont bien moindres. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal speaks softly, as though trying to match the inflections of Abel's voice:{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has passed the diagnostics. The pernicious influence of sacrilegious procedures has been completely eliminated. Statistically, most survivors of a schismaticals' infestation are left with severe cognitive impairments. However, Tech-Brother Abel's mind, being of a less typical nature, has not been damaged to so great a degree."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal parle doucement, comme pour se caler sur les inflexions vocales d'Abel :{/n} « Le technofrère Abel s'est soumis aux diagnostics. L'influence pernicieuse des procédures sacrilèges a été éradiquée. Statistiquement, la plupart des survivants à une infestation schismatique souffrent de graves séquelles cognitives. Cependant, l'esprit d'Abel étant d'une nature plus atypique, les dégâts qui lui ont été infligés sont bien moindres. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal habla con suavidad, como si intentase emular las inflexiones de la voz de Abel.{/n} «El tecnohermano Abel ha completado el diagnóstico. El pernicioso influjo de los procedimientos sacrílegos ha sido completamente erradicado. En términos estadísticos, a la mayoría de los supervivientes de una infestación cismática les quedan graves minusvalías cognitivas. Sin embargo, la mente del tecnohermano Abel, al ser de una naturaleza atípica, no ha resultado dañada en demasía».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal speaks softly, as though trying to match the inflections of Abel's voice:{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has passed the diagnostics. The pernicious influence of sacrilegious procedures has been completely eliminated. Statistically, most survivors of a schismaticals' infestation are left with severe cognitive impairments. However, Tech-Brother Abel's mind, being of a less typical nature, has not been damaged to so great a degree."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal habla con suavidad, como si intentase emular las inflexiones de la voz de Abel.{/n} «El tecnohermano Abel ha completado el diagnóstico. El pernicioso influjo de los procedimientos sacrílegos ha sido completamente erradicado. En términos estadísticos, a la mayoría de los supervivientes de una infestación cismática les quedan graves minusvalías cognitivas. Sin embargo, la mente del tecnohermano Abel, al ser de una naturaleza atípica, no ha resultado dañada en demasía».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, Abel'in sesindeki alçalıp yükselmelere uyum sağlamaya çalışırcasına, hafifçe konuşuyor:{/n} "Tekno Kardeş Abel, tanı sürecinden olumlu sonuç aldı. Kâfirce prosedürlerin habis etkisi tamamen ortadan kaldırılmış durumda. Bölücülerin istilasından sağ kalanlar, istatistiksel olarak çoğunlukla ağır bilişsel özürlere sahip olurlar. Lakin Tekno Kardeş Abel'in zihni, daha az tipik bir doğaya sahip olması nedeniyle, o ölçekte bir hasarla karşı karşıya kalmamış."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal speaks softly, as though trying to match the inflections of Abel's voice:{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has passed the diagnostics. However, Tech-Brother Abel's mind, being of a less typical nature, has not been damaged to so great a degree."
